name: Christmas Wonderland 13
description:
Santa’s Magical Christmas Wonderland Adventure for All the Family to Enjoy!

Enjoy magnificent Holiday Festivities in Springfield. Help Santa at the North Pole. Visit Toy Workshops and an awesome Candyland Factory. Go to a Charity Christmas Market & Santa’s Enchanted Grotto in Pinecreek Hills National Park.

Decorate the NEW Christmas Wonderland House. Win fabulous Rewards & Achievements. Search for Frosty the Snowman. Take photos, make an Album.

The Toys are made and it’s Christmas Eve! Rudolph and the team are hitched to the Sleigh. Santa flies around the World while Kids are asleep, or are they? … soon it’s another sensational Christmas Morning.

Help Santa find Hidden Objects, Lost Presents, Gold Angels & Reindeer. Play superb Mini-Games. Earn Merit Badges.

Christmas Wonderland 13 is crammed full of Presents & Hidden Surprises with Gorgeous Graphics and Puzzles. Play in 3 modes ( Casual, Challenge, Extreme – collect ALL against the clock ) Join in the fun, with Captivating Christmas gameplay for Families and Friends of All abilities and ages to enjoy.
